text: Craig y Rhiwarth () is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock, Powys, Wales. There is also a hillfort. Craig y Rhiwarth Natur Cymru. Retrieved 3 November 2017.Craig-y-Rhiwarth, hillfort Coflein.
